short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes idle and duplicate tabs, freeing up clutter and helping you stay focused on what matters most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Reaper is an open-source Chrome extension that automatically closes idle and duplicate tabs, freeing up clutter and helping you stay focused on what matters most. Say goodbye to tab overload and hello to a clean, organized browsing experience.
